options.title: Fluvius Options
options.description: Configure history window, granularity, meter type, and gas unit.

data_description.timezone: Used to build the date range when requesting history from Fluvius.
data_description.days_back: Number of days to fetch per refresh. Gas meters always request at least seven days.
data_description.granularity: Fluvius API granularity code (3 quarter-hour, 4 daily). Gas meters always use daily.
data_description.meter_type: Choose whether this entry targets an electricity or gas meter.
data_description.gas_unit: For gas meters, pick whether to store energy (kWh) or volume (m3).
data_description.verbose_logging: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting API issues. Logs will show full request/response details.

user.title: Connect to Fluvius
user.description: Enter the credentials that you also use on mijn.fluvius.be and select the meter you want to expose to Home Assistant.

data_description.email: Use the same email address you provide on mijn.fluvius.be.
data_description.password: Stored securely and exchanged for a short-lived Fluvius access token.
data_description.ean: 18-digit identifier printed on your utility bill (per meter).
data_description.meter_serial: Matches the serial number shown in the Fluvius portal (for example 1SAG...).
data_description.meter_type: Create one entry per meter and choose whether it is an electricity or a gas meter.

reauth_confirm.title: Reconnect to Fluvius
reauth_confirm.description: Your Fluvius credentials stopped working. Provide the updated values below.

data_description.email: Update the email if your Fluvius login changed.
data_description.password: Enter the new password so the integration can refresh its session.
data_description.ean: Confirm the same EAN that this entry manages.
data_description.meter_serial: Confirm the meter serial stored in Fluvius.
data_description.meter_type: If you swapped hardware, pick the correct meter type before saving.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to reach the Fluvius API. Please try again later.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid email, password, or meter information.
error.unknown: Unexpected error while setting up the integration.

abort.already_configured: This Fluvius EAN is already configured.
